Seven College Listings

Only for full width page layouts. Not for pages with sidebars.

Use this snippet when you are wanting to list all seven colleges as a navigation item into more specific college content.

Seven-College Listing (One Row)

Brookhaven College
Cedar Valley College
Eastfield College
El Centro College
Mountain View College
North Lake College
Richland College

Mini College Buttons (based on Mini Buttons)

Use this at the top of a page where you want users to flip through this content between various college views. Or when wanting the user to flip through the content of this page, but flitered out by college.

Mini College Button Generator

Brookhaven Cedar Valley Eastfield El Centro Mountain View North Lake Richland 
<div class="button-nav">
  <a href="https://www.brookhavencollege.edu" class="button button-mn cwhite BHC card-1">Brookhaven</a>
  <a href="https://www.cedarvalleycollege.edu" class="button button-mn cwhite CVC card-1">Cedar Valley</a>
  <a href="https://www.eastfieldcollege.edu" class="button button-mn cwhite EFC card-1">Eastfield</a>
  <a href="https://www.elcentrocollege.edu" class="button button-mn cwhite ECC card-1">El Centro</a>
  <a href="https://www.mountainviewcollege.edu" class="button button-mn cwhite MVC card-1">Mountain View</a>
  <a href="https://www.northlakecollege.edu" class="button button-mn cwhite NLC card-1">North Lake</a>
  <a href="https://www.richlandcollege.edu" class="button button-mn cwhite RLC card-1">Richland</a>
</div>

Back to the top

GPS Career Paths

Only for full width page layouts. Not for pages with sidebars.

This snippet can be used whenever you would like to list out all seven of the GPS Career Paths. Only use it on a full-width page.

View Other Career Paths

Arts, Humanities, Communications & Design Career Path
Business Career Path
Education Career Path
Health Sciences Career Path
Industry, Manufacturing & Construction Career Path
Social Sciences & Public Service Career Path
STEM Career Path
 
<div class="button-nav">
  <div class="row college-row">
    <h2 class="text-center">View Other Career Paths</h2>
